oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snelle methoden voor het testen van plantaardige, biologische producten
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simeone, F.C.
van Ruth, Saskia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Systems research and participatory research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The talk presented new strategies and challenges for the authentication of organic foods to a non-technical audience. The talk presented the use of chemomentrics as a tool for the simultaneous analysis of a number of compounds which can be detected in foods.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Simeone, F.C. and van Ruth, Saskia (2015) Snelle methoden voor het testen van plantaardige, biologische producten. Speech at: Bio-Beurs, Zwolle (NL), 21-22 Janury 2015. [Completed]
